info.description: BSV blockchain indexer API for transaction outputs, blocks, and related data
info.title: 1Sat Indexer API

get.description: Server-Sent Events stream of transaction status updates for transactions associated with the callback token

200.description: SSE stream of transaction status updates

get.description: Returns the health status of the service
Returns the transaction policy configuration including fee rates and limits

post.description: Submit a single transaction for broadcast. Accepts raw transaction bytes, hex string, or JSON with rawTx field.

get.description: Get the current status of a submitted transaction
Returns a block header with the specified hash
Returns a block header at the specified height
Returns block headers starting from height as binary data (80 bytes per header)
Returns the current blockchain height
Returns the Bitcoin network this service is connected to
Returns the current chain tip block header
Server-Sent Events stream of chain tip updates. Sends the current tip immediately, then broadcasts new tips as they arrive.

200.description: SSE stream of BlockHeader JSON objects

get.description: Search for transaction outputs by event tag, id, and value

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

post.description: Parse a transaction and return indexed data
Force ingest a transaction by txid

get.description: Parse a transaction and return indexed data
Get all transaction outputs for a specific transaction

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

get.description: Get the satoshi balance for a specific owner

parameters.description: Owner identifier (address, pubkey, or script hash)
parameters.name: owner

get.description: Get paginated outputs for wallet synchronization. Returns a merged stream of outputs and spends ordered by score. Each outpoint may appear twice - once when created and once when spent. SpendTxid is populated for all outputs that have been spent.

parameters.description: Owner identifier (address, pubkey, or script hash)
parameters.name: owner

get.description: Get transaction outputs owned by a specific owner (address/pubkey/script hash)

parameters.description: Owner identifier (address, pubkey, or script hash)
parameters.name: owner

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

get.description: Get unspent transaction outputs owned by a specific owner

parameters.description: Owner identifier (address, pubkey, or script hash)
parameters.name: owner

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

get.description: Server-Sent Events stream for real-time event notifications. Supports resumption via Last-Event-ID header.

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of event topics to subscribe to
parameters.name: events

get.description: Search for transaction outputs by tag

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

get.description: Returns the raw transaction bytes for a given transaction ID
Returns the transaction in BEEF (Background Evaluation Extended Format) format
Returns the merkle proof bytes for a given transaction ID
Returns the bytes of a specific transaction output

400.description: Invalid txid format or output index

post.description: Get multiple transaction outputs by outpoints

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

post.description: Get spend information for multiple transaction outputs

get.description: Get a transaction output by outpoint

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of tags to include (use * for all indexed tags)
parameters.name: tags

get.description: Get spend information for a transaction output by outpoint
